
```
# CLAUDE.md

## Overview
This is a personal portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The site showcases professional experience, skills, projects, and includes AI-assisted features.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui components
- next-themes for dark/light mode
- Vercel Analytics & Speed Insights

## Development Commands
- `pnpm dev` - Start development server (port 3000)
- `pnpm build` - Production build
- `pnpm lint` - ESLint checking
- `pnpm test` - Run Jest tests

## Architecture
- **app/**: Page routes using App Router
- **src/components/**: Reusable React components (ai/, layout/, sections/, ui/)
- **src/data/**: Static data files (profile.ts, projects.ts, etc.)
- **lib/**: Utility functions
- **public/**: Static assets

## Key Patterns
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow existing component patterns in src/components
- Use Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui for styling
- Use next-themes for theme management
- Semantic HTML for accessibility
```

**Summary**

This is a Next.js 15 portfolio website with the following structure:

- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **UI Library**: shadcn/ui components with Radix UI primitives
- **Main directories**:
  - `app/` - Next.js App Router pages (main page, resume page, layout)
  - `src/components/` - React components organized by category (ai, layout, sections, ui)
  - `src/data/` - Static data files (profile, projects, skills, experience, certifications)
  - `src/hooks/` - Custom React hooks
  - `lib/` - Utility functions
  - `docs/` - Documentation
  - `public/` - Static assets
  - `__tests__/` - Jest test files

- **Key features**: Dark/light theme support, analytics, AI chat widget, responsive design

### Critical Files for Implementation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/CLAUDE.md` - Project overview and development guidelines
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/app/page.tsx` - Main page component
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/data/profile.ts` - Core profile data structure
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/components/sections/` - Main section components
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/package.json` - Dependencies and scripts
